001package game;
002import java.io.InputStream;
003import java.util.Scanner;
004import java.util.Stack;
005
006/**
007 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
008 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
009 * 
010 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
011 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
012 *  the parser returns.
013 * 
014 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
015 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
016 */
017public class GameEngine
018{
019    private final Parser        aParser;
020    //private Room          aCurrentRoom;
021    //private Stack<Room> aPreviouRooms;
022    //private LinkedList<Room> aLastRooms;
023    private UserInterface aGui;
024    private boolean aTestMode;
025    private Player aPlayer;
026
027    /**
028     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
029     */
030    public GameEngine()
031    {
032        this.aParser = new Parser();
033        this.createRooms();
034        //this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
035        this.aTestMode = false;
036       
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Sets the GUI
041     * @param pUserInterface User Interface 
042     */
043    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
044    {
045        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
046        this.printWelcome();
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Print out the opening message for the player.
051     */
052    private void printWelcome()
053    {
054        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
055        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to game of The return of Yamata no Orochi !" );
056        this.aGui.println( "The monster came back to life and Tetsuma must create a katana to save Japan !." );
057        this.aGui.println("From now, you have to help him find materials to let him create the weapon !");
058        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
059        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
060        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
061        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
062            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
063    }
064
065   /**
066     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
067     */
068    private void createRooms(){
069        Room vShirago = new Room("in your village of birth, Shirakawa-go.","./Images/shirakawa.jpg");
070        Room vGujoHachi = new Room("In the Gujô Hachiman castle.","./Images/gujohachi.jpg");
071        Room vOsaka = new Room("in the Osaka city.","./Images/Osaka.jpg");
072        Room vTsushi = new Room("in the Tsushima island.","./Images/Tsushima.jpg");
073        Room vSeki = new Room("in the Seki blacksmiths village, it's the end of your odyssey.","./Images/seki.jpg");
074        Room vNara = new Room("in the Nara city known for its deers.","./Images/Nara_fire.jpg");
075        Room vGinkaku = new Room("in the Ginkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Ginkakuji_fall_2.jpg");
076        Room vKinkaku = new Room("in the Kinkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Kinkaku.jpg");
077        Room vYoshino = new Room("in the Yoshino national park, the forest is big here.","./Images/Yoshino_park.jpg");
078        Room vNagoya  = new Room("in the Nagoya city","./Images/Nagoya.jpg");
079        Room vMtFuji = new Room("at the foot of the Mt Fuji.","./Images/MtFuji.jpg");
080        Room vTokyo = new Room("in the Tokyo tower, the biggest tower of Japan.","./Images/tokyo_tower.jpg");
081        Room vSapporo = new Room("in the Sapporo city, in the north of Japan.","./Images/sapporo_snow.jpg");
082        Room vAogashi = new Room("in the island of Aogashima, in the middle of the ocean.","./Images/Aogashima.jpg");
083        
084        
085        
086        vShirago.setExit("south", vGujoHachi);
087        vShirago.addItem("Mochi", new Item("A sweety mochi", 1));
088
089        // GujoHachi : up -> MtFuji, west -> Osaka
090        vGujoHachi.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
091        vGujoHachi.setExit("west", vOsaka);
092
093        // Osaka : north -> Ginkaku, east -> GujoHachi, south -> Nara, west -> Tsushi
094        vOsaka.setExit("north", vGinkaku);
095        vOsaka.setExit("east", vGujoHachi);
096        vOsaka.setExit("south", vNara);
097        vOsaka.setExit("west", vTsushi);
098        vOsaka.addItem("Anko mochi", new Item("A mochi with anko flavour of Osaka", 2));
099
100        // Ginkaku : east -> Kinkaku, south -> Osaka
101        vGinkaku.setExit("east", vKinkaku);
102        vGinkaku.setExit("south", vOsaka);
103        vGinkaku.addItem("Silver Shigane", new Item("A silver metal used for blade crafting", 3));
104
105        // Kinkaku : south -> Ginkaku
106        vKinkaku.setExit("south", vGinkaku);
107        vKinkaku.addItem("Gold Tamagane", new Item("A golden metal used for blade crafting", 3));
108
109        // Tsushi : north -> Osaka, east -> Seki
110        vTsushi.setExit("north", vOsaka);
111        vTsushi.setExit("east", vSeki);
112        vTsushi.addItem("Volcanic stone", new Item("A stone impregnated by the sea god's energy", 2));
113
114        // Seki : west -> Tsushi
115        vSeki.setExit("west", vTsushi);
116
117        // Nara : east -> Yoshino
118        vNara.setExit("east", vYoshino);
119        vNara.addItem("Horn of the goddess", new Item("A horn given by the goddess of deers", 2));
120
121        // Yoshino : east -> Nagoya
122        vYoshino.setExit("east", vNagoya);
123        vYoshino.addItem("Bamboo of holy forest", new Item("A rare type of bamboo which only exists here", 2));
124
125        // Nagoya : up -> MtFuji, west -> Yoshino
126        vNagoya.setExit("west", vYoshino);
127        vNagoya.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
128
129        // MtFuji : north -> Sapporo, east -> Tokyo, south -> Nagoya, west -> GujoHachi
130        vMtFuji.setExit("down-north", vSapporo);
131        vMtFuji.setExit("down-east", vTokyo);
132        vMtFuji.setExit("down-south", vNagoya);
133        vMtFuji.setExit("down-west", vGujoHachi);
134
135        // Tokyo : west -> Nagoya
136        vTokyo.setExit("west", vNagoya);
137
138        // Sapporo : south -> Aogashi
139        vSapporo.setExit("south", vAogashi);
140        vSapporo.addItem("Ice'dragon's amulet",new Item("An amulet which freezes monsters and yokais", 5));
141
142
143        // Aogashi : north -> Sapporo, south -> Tokyo
144        vAogashi.setExit("north", vSapporo);
145        vAogashi.setExit("south", vTokyo);
146        vAogashi.addItem("Aogashima's salt", new Item("Holy salt used for purifying monsters", 1));
147        this.aPlayer = new Player("Tetsuma");
148        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vShirago);
149
150    }
151
152    /**
153     * Print a sentence.
154     */
155    private void eat(final Command pCmd){
156        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
157            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
158            return;
159        }
160        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
161        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
162        if(vItem == null){
163            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
164        } 
165        if (!vItemName.equals("Anko Mochi")){
166            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this item !");
167            return;
168
169        }
170        this.aPlayer.superPower();
171        this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
172        this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
173        this.aGui.println("You have eaten the Anko Mochi ! Your maximum weight has been doubled !");
174        return;
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Print out the description of the current room.
179     */
180    private void look(){
181        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
182        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
183            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Go back to the previous room
188     */
189    private void back(){
190        Room vPreviousRoom = this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom();
191        if(vPreviousRoom == null){
192            this.aGui.println("You can't go back any further !");
193        }
194        else{
195            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPreviousRoom);
196            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
197            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
198                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
199        }
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * Take an item from the room
204     * @param pCmd The command to process
205     */
206    public void take(final Command pCmd){
207        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
208            this.aGui.println("Take what ?");
209            return;
210        }
211        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
212        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
213        if(vItem == null){
214            this.aGui.println("This item is not here !");
215        } else{
216            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() + vItem.getItemWeight();
217            if(vNewWeight > this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight()){
218                this.aGui.println("You can't take this item, it's too heavy !");
219            } else{
220                this.aPlayer.addItem(vItemName, vItem);
221                this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
222                this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
223                this.aGui.println("You have taken the " + vItemName);
224            }
225        }
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Drop an item in the room
230     * @param pCmd The command to process
231     */
232    public void drop(final Command pCmd){
233        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
234            this.aGui.println("Drop what ?");
235            return;
236        }
237        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
238        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
239        if(vItem == null){
240            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
241        } else{
242            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
243            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight();
244            this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
245            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItemName, vItem);
246            this.aGui.println("You have dropped the " + vItemName);
247        }
248    }
249    /**
250     * Show player's inventory
251     */
252    private void playerInventory(){
253        this.aGui.println("You have : \n" + this.aPlayer.getItems());
254        this.aGui.println("Current weight : " + this.aPlayer.getWeight() + " / " + this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight());
255       
256    }
257
258
259    /**
260     * Process the command. Return true if the command ends the game, false otherwise.
261     * @param pCmdLine The command to process.
262     */
263    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmdLine) {
264        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmdLine);
265        Command pCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmdLine );
266        if (pCmd.isUnknown()) {
267            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
268            return;
269        }
270        String vCommandWord = pCmd.getCommandWord();
271        if ("help".equals(vCommandWord)) {
272            this.printHelp();
273        } else if ("go".equals(vCommandWord)) {
274            this.goRooms(pCmd);
275        } else if ("quit".equals(vCommandWord)) {
276            if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
277                this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
278            } else {
279                this.endGame();
280            }
281
282        } else if("look".equals(vCommandWord)){
283            this.look();
284        } else if ("eat".equals(vCommandWord)){
285            this.eat(pCmd);
286        } else if ("back".equals(vCommandWord)){
287            this.back();
288        } else if("test".equals(vCommandWord)){
289            this.testFile(pCmd);
290        } else if("take".equals(vCommandWord)){
291            this.take(pCmd);
292        } else if("drop".equals(vCommandWord)){
293            this.drop(pCmd);
294        } else if("items".equals(vCommandWord)){
295            this.playerInventory();
296        }
297        else {
298            System.out.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
299            return;
300        }
301    }
302
303    
304    /**
305     * Launch a test file
306     * @param pCommand The command to process
307     */
308    private void testFile (final Command pCommand){
309        if(pCommand.hasSecondWord() == false){
310            this.aGui.println("Error : you must specify a file name !");
311            return;
312        }
313      
314        String vFileName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
315        vFileName+=".txt";
316        InputStream vInputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(vFileName);
317        Scanner vScanner = new Scanner(vInputStream);      
318        if(vInputStream != null){
319            this.aTestMode = true;
320            while(vScanner.hasNextLine()){
321                String vLigne = vScanner.nextLine();
322                this.aGui.processCommand(vLigne);
323            }
324        }
325        this.aTestMode = false;
326        vScanner.close();
327    }
328
329   
330
331    // implementations of user commands:
332
333   /**
334     * Print out some help information.
335     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.
336     */
337    public void printHelp(){
338        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\r\n" + //
339                        "You wander around Japan.\r\n" + //
340                        "\r\n" + //
341                        "Your command words are:\r\n" +  this.aParser.showCommands() //
342                        );
343       
344    }
345    /**
346     * Go to the room in the given direction. If there is no room in that
347     * direction, print an error message.
348     * @param pCmd the command to process (should contain "go" and a direction).
349     */
350    private void goRooms(Command pCmd){
351        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
352            System.out.println("Go where ?");
353            return;
354        };
355        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
356        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
357        if(vNextRoom == null){
358            this.aGui.println("There's no door");
359        } else {
360            this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
361            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
362            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
363            if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
364                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
365            else{
366                System.out.println("Image non trouvée");
367            }
368        }
369    }
370
371
372    /**
373     * End the game
374     */
375    public void endGame(){
376        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
377        this.aGui.enable( false );
378    }
379
380    /**
381     * Get item names present in the current room (for UI selection)
382     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
383     */
384    public String[] getCurrentRoomItemNames(){
385        return this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItemNames();
386    }
387
388    /**
389     * Get item names present in player's inventory (for UI selection)
390     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
391     */
392    public String[] getPlayerItemNames(){
393        return this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
394    }
